mapper.select: select * from Reservation Reservation left join Pet Pet on Reservation.pet_Index = Pet.pet_Index left join Company Company on Reservation.company_Index = Company.company_Index where Reservation.pet_Index = #{ pet_Index }

select * from Reservation Reservation left join Pet Pet on Reservation.pet_Index = Pet.pet_Index left join Company Company on Reservation.company_Index = Company.company_Index where Reservation.company_Index = #{ company_Index }
select company_Index from Reservation where reservation_Index = #{reservation_Index}
mapper.insert: insert into Reservation (pet_Index, company_Index, reservation_Date, reservation_Time, reservation_DetailService) values(#{pet_Index}, #{company_Index}, #{reservation_Date}, #{reservation_Time}, #{reservation_DetailService})
mapper.delete: delete from Reservation where reservation_Index = #{ reservation_Index }
